remarks:
Addition to both sides of 'less than or equal to'.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1999.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.) 

---

 Addition to both sides of 'less than or equal to'.  Part of definition 11.2.7(vi) of [HoTT], p.  (varies).  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1999.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement: leadd1 $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( A <_ B <-> ( A + C ) <_ ( B + C ) ) ) $.
